entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
